title: Tamargueira (Tamarix gallica)
body: Tree or shrub in the Tamaricaceae family, widely cultivated in Porto Santo, where it was introduced by Jo찾o Ant처nio Pedroso in 1834. Some tamarisk trees are also found in the estates and gardens of Madeira.

Jo찾o Ant처nio Pedroso: Introduced the tamarisk tree to Porto Santo

1834: Introduction of the tamarisk tree to Porto Santo
